title: 求解决下列2个问题
author: gaowentao12138
txt_content:
怎么另外生成一个主世界
和圈地插件怎么设置圈地价钱

replies.author: 小烦
replies.txt_content:
1.
多世界插件，以下两个都可以
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-101532-1-1.html
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-225484-1-1.html
贴内有详细的说明

2、
plugins/Residence/config.yml
找到
 BuyCost: 0.05复制代码
修改即可，单位是 每个方块
上面的就是 0.05块/方块

replies.author: coxing131425
replies.txt_content:
1.MV多世界插件
2.圈地插件配置问题

replies.author: YQ2758136148
replies.txt_content:
/mv create 世界名 normal
领地配置 BuyCost: 价格

replies.author: 神哥丿
replies.txt_content:
[创世|管理|传送]Multiverse-Core —— 多世界管理插件[1.9-1.4.5]
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=101532

修改价格
plugins\Residence\groups
# The cost, per block, of making a new Residence or adding a area to it.
BuyCost: 0.05

0.05块一方块
